## Keyword descriptions for `chrom_method` field.

| Keyword    | Description                                                          |
|------------|------------------------------------------------|
|bfg_nts_rp1|Chromatographic method used for most BfG data. Further information can be found in [Nürenberg et al (2015)](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.chroma.2015.11.014).|
|lw_nts_rp1 |Chromatographic method used for data from LW|
|lanuv_nts|Chromatographic method used for data from LANUV|
